name: EvangelistFinder
0:
”Alexa, Ask evangelist finder to find somone in boston.”
”who is in boston”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evangelist finder
des: This skill helps users to look for an evangelist by mentioning the place name. For example, to find out someone in the city boston, please say, "Alexa, open team lookup, who is in boston" or "Alexa, open team lookup, find me an evangelist in boston" or "Alexa, open team lookup, find me someone in boston"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
